properties.Name: ProductDirectMaterialsBudget
properties.Description: The Direct Materials Budget details the cost items that must be purchased to fulfill the production, sales, inventory or support requirements of a specific product or service.

Columns.Name: ProductDirectMaterialsBudgetId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product Direct Materials Budget.

Columns.Name: ProductDirectMaterialsBudgetVersionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product Direct Materials Budget Version.

Columns.Name: ProductId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product.

Columns.Name: OperatingBudgetId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product/Service Operating Budget.

Columns.Name: OperatingBudgetVersionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Operating Budget Version.

Columns.Name: BudgetedDirectMaterialsCostsAmount
Columns.Description: The planned direct materials costs for the associated period and product/service budget.

Columns.Name: ActualDirectMaterialsCostsAmount
Columns.Description: The actual direct materials costs for the associated period and product/service budget.
